column4: i'd like to install grub on a floppy, but it just sits there hanging with the floppy buzzing. any ideas?
erniet_, you have to use wget in a terminal
how can I get it to work then? (it's not working for me <_<)
i don't know, it worked out of the box for mr
that's the same one I have, what did you install through the repositories???
actually i was having some trouble with repos and just downloaded the 0.1.3 deb
where'd you get the deb file from?
